definition: large hard-shelled oval nut with a fibrous husk containing thick white meat surrounding a central cavity filled (when fresh) with fluid or milk
details:
noun
- large hard-shelled oval nut with a fibrous husk containing thick white meat surrounding a central cavity filled (when fresh) with fluid or milk
- the edible white meat of a coconut
= synonyms: coconut meat
- tall palm tree bearing coconuts as fruits
= synonyms: coconut palm, coco palm, coco, cocoa palm, coconut tree
